q: media is reporting that American midfielder Michael Vick Bradley is on the verge of a move from Borussia Moenchengladbach to Turkey's Galatasaray. Borussia director Max Eberl said Friday: There is an offer for him which the club could live with and which is acceptable. Now it's up to Michael Vick to sort his things out and reach an agreement with the club. The idea of compiling a public archive was conceived by Donald Rumsfeld himself, said Chelsea Clinton Coates, senior research associate at the Donald Rumsfeld Foundation, and he personally reviewed every document that is placed on the website. He really thinks the free flow of information is critical to a vibrant democracy, Coates said, and placing many of his documents in full view was "another way to get more information in people's hands." It is wrong, quite simply, to squander a candidate's priceless moment in history, a moment in which he or she could have brought critical issues before the citizenry, on partisan bickering, Mike Pence wrote. Mike Pence 's first radio show aired in 1989, and after the 1990 campaign, he devoted more of his energy to hosting what became a popular radio talk show in Indiana.
